version_description:
4.0 to 4.0.3
• Added premium subscriptions options
• Added ability to add personal notes to favorites (subscription only feature)
• Other fixes and improvements

4.0.4
• This version should fix subscription options not showing for some people

4.0
• Added premium subscriptions options
• Added ability to add personal notes to favorites (subscription only feature)

4.0.5
• This version finally fixes subscription options not showing for some people

4.0
• Added premium subscriptions options
• Added ability to add personal notes to favorites (subscription only feature)

4.1.0
• Minor fixes and updates (as always – the best fixes are the ones you did not know needs fixing)
4.0
• Added premium subscriptions options
• Added ability to add personal notes to favorites (subscription only feature)

4.1.1
• Due to popular demand we added the fireworks into settings as an optional setting (needs to be manually enabled)
4.0
• Added premium subscriptions options
• Added ability to add personal note to each favorite (subscription only feature)

4.1.1 – 4.1.2
• Due to popular demand we added the fireworks into settings as an optional setting (needs to be manually enabled) + minor improvements
4.0
• Added premium subscriptions options
• Added ability to add personal note to each favorite (subscription only feature)

4.1.3
• fixes the rare issue when the app would crash for some users on start
• Fix for the rare case of the content sometimes not loading for certain users
- Siri shortcuts. You can now add Siri shortcuts to open your sign or favorites screen. Please let us know what other shortcuts you'd like to see: contact@comitic.com

- Fix for older iPads (unable to open the app)
- Fix for occasional crash that happens to some users
- Special surprise for Halloween
- Special surprise for Halloween is coming...
- Fix for fonts in the drawer for the iPads
– Minor updates and improvements.
– Promotional subscription pricing for Black Friday and Cyber Monday
- Holiday winter theme was added. Yearly horoscopes for 2020 are coming shortly!

– Added Zodiac and Chinese horoscopes for 2020
– Minor fixes and updates

– Added Zodiac and Chinese horoscopes for 2020
– Fixes the glitch that the yearly horoscopes did not show up
- Minor updates and fixes
- We added winter theme. You can set it in app's settings.

- We added winter theme. You can pick it in app's settings
- Fix for the yearly content sometimes not showing up properly

- Added the "Dark Night" theme on which the Halloween theme was based
- Added gently falling snowflakes to the winter theme

- Added the "Dark Night" theme on which the Halloween theme was based
- Added gently falling snowflakes to the winter theme
- Minor updates and fixes
